"How many people are affected by neuropathy, ataxia, and retinitis pigmentosa ?","The prevalence of NARP is unknown. This disorder is probably less common than a similar but more severe condition, Leigh syndrome, which affects about 1 in 40,000 people.",GHR,"neuropathy, ataxia, and retinitis pigmentosa"
